metadata.description: KanjiOdoko is a lifelong collection revolving around anime inspired characters, each individually designed and made for future utility. The first collection will consist of the Genesis Mint Pass that is the key to all future airdrops. Our core team is situated in Tokyo procuring future collaborations for all pass holders. We currently have majority of 2022 all planned out and will soon be working past this.
metadata.name: Genesis Mint Pass #2
